evals.name: write-definition-article
evals.prompt: Write a definition article about 'Retrieval-Augmented Generation' for AI citations.
evals.expected_output: Complete 'What is RAG?' article with definition, characteristics, how it works, comparison, examples, and FAQ section.

evals.name: write-faq-page
evals.prompt: Create an FAQ page about project management software for our website.
evals.expected_output: Structured FAQ page with general questions, getting started, and troubleshooting sections with complete standalone answers.

evals.name: write-comparison-guide
evals.prompt: Write a comparison guide: Notion vs Asana for AI search.
evals.expected_output: Comparison guide with quick answer, side-by-side table, detailed analysis, strengths/weaknesses, and recommendation based on use case.
